name: RN apps: Share extension used to send a screenshot

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)
customFields.Update notes: 21 Sep 9 - (LI) - Not able to test share extension in RF

inline.description:
RN Share extension used to send a screenshot
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. On your mobile device, take a screenshot
  2. Select share and share to Mattermost share extension
  3. Select a channel and team and add some text
  4. Send
inline.expectedResult: • The post with screen shot correctly appears in the channel

customFields.Important notes about this step: You can find test files here: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1xGCy3tp9A_WxOfdgAzBHzrqJ1WCyfSjW
